channel.title: [Matrix 718] Help with NPC Dialogues [Matrix 718]
channel.description:
Hi guys,
I would like to ask if anyone can explain to me the Matrix 718 dialogue system. Everything else works perfectly fine but I just need some help on understanding the basics of the Matrix 718 dialogue system. I have the Matrix 718 Source + Client (you can search that up on MoparScape forums just use search bar or google), so yeah, just need some help.
Many thanks in advance,
I Pk 22.
